# 学习Ionic - 使用Ionic构建实时混合移动应用（初稿）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xuexi-ionic-shiyong-ionic-goujian-shishi-hunhe-yidong-yingyong-chugao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xuexi-ionic-shiyong-ionic-goujian-shishi-hunhe-yidong-yingyong-chugao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xuexi-ionic-shiyong-ionic-goujian-shishi-hunhe-yidong-yingyong-chugao
xuexi-ionic-shiyong-ionic-goujian-shishi-hunhe-yidong-yingyong-chugao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xuexi-ionic-shiyong-ionic-goujian-shishi-hunhe-yidong-yingyong-chugao
xuexi-ionic-shiyong-ionic-goujian-shishi-hunhe-yidong-yingyong-chugao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
